summary.span: 提供給 屬性的型別轉換子。

span.span: Provides the type converter for the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要與其他表示相互轉換，請將轉換的物件參考。 converts object references to and from other representations.

permission.span: 提供執行 unmanaged 程式碼的權限。

span.span: for the right to execute unmanaged code.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection GetStandardValues (System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter/StandardValuesCollection GetStandardValues(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetStandardValues (context As ITypeDescriptorContext) As TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection

abstract member GetStandardValues : System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext -> System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection override this.GetStandardValues : System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext -> System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection

span.span: An that provides a format context.

summary.span: 針對這個驗證程式設計目標的資料型別，取得由該資料型別的標準值所組成的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of standard values for the data type this validator is designed for.

returns.span: 會保留標準有效值的集合，如果資料型別不支援標準值集合，則為 。

span.span: A that holds a standard set of valid values, or if the data type does not support a standard set of values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用 `context` 參數來擷取環境的其他資訊，而這個轉換子就是從這個環境叫用的。The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from. 這可能是 `null`，所以一定要檢查。This can be `null`, so always check. 甚至，內容物件上的屬性可能會傳回 `null`。Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.

span.span: An that provides a format context.

summary.span: 使用指定的內容傳回數值，表示這個物件是否支援可從清單中選取的標準值集合。

span.span: Indicates whether this object supports a standard set of values that can be picked from a list using the specified context.

returns.span: 因為應該呼叫 來尋找物件支援的通用值集合，所以會是 。

span.span: because should be called to find a common set of values the object supports.

returns.span: 這個方法永遠不會傳回 。

span.span: This method never returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用 `context` 參數來擷取環境的其他資訊，而這個轉換子就是從這個環境叫用的。The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from. 這可能是 `null`，所以一定要檢查。This can be `null`, so always check. 甚至，內容物件上的屬性可能會傳回 `null`。Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.
